value.name: A sister’s quest for answers in Manuel Ellis’ death
value.description: Even his home town, Manuel Ellis' killing by police went largely overlooked. Then his sister, Monet Carter-Mixon, went looking for answers. Her quest ended Thursday with unprecedented charges against three officers,

value.name: Inslee signs sweeping police reform measures
value.description: The bills signed Tuesday include measures that ban police from using chokeholds, neck restraints and no-knock warrants.

value.name: City of Kent to pay $4.4 million to family of unarmed Black man shot and killed by police
value.description: KENT, Wash. - The city of Kent has agreed to pay the family of Giovonn Joseph-McDade, an unarmed Black man shot and killed by police in 2017, $4.4 million in a settlement over his death.
